name: PLANT GIRLS: INSECT INVASION
description:
Plant Girls: Insect Invasion is a strategic tower defense game that revolves around the clash of two races: the lustful Cyborg Insects and beautiful Plant Girls.

Set in a post-apocalyptic world of the once-empire city Detroite, try to deal with the aftermath of a tragic societal collapse because of man-made catastrophe they themselves created: the Cyborg Insects.

What will you do if your very own creation turned against you?

Will you let one failure stop you from something that will save the future?
